title: We made an entire fantasy book - and it's the most irresponsible project we’ve done!
description:
We just made a fantasy book, for our universe - Champions of Sona - with  New York Times best seller Richard A. Knaak. You can get the book here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/wraithmarked/pathsofsona
